body: Guess what guys! Just got home from school... You'd think it would be all fine and dandy.. Right? Wrong.. I have a 2 page Essay due tomorrow.... D:
body_tagged: Guess what guys! Just got home from school... You'd think it would be all fine and dandy.. Right? Wrong.. I have a 2 page Essay due tomorrow.... D:
title: First Day of School, In Canada...

replies.body:
Kay... I wouldn't update your personal life but... I can help..

1) When your teacher says: Listening to your iPod is a waste of time!
Wrong! Music (Such as Mozart) really impoves thinking! And it adds more fun whilst writing an essay!
2) Chew gum! (Advice, *Matthew Santoro*)
And so on! Just dont take it hard... Its just a bit of work :/

replies.body: In my school is something wrong... in all this week, I haven't any homework! It is strange, and in the school my teachers didn't give me any work (Only today a test, I got 10/10 calification) :P

replies.body: In my geography class all of our notes will be taken on computers, all work and assignments will also be on the computers, xD only thing not on computers is tests + final exams, also my school ddosed their own computers xD so they are watching our every click on the school computers
